message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, potentially even more so than to me.  I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on this product, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to pay up to $850,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I understand your budgetary constraints, however, I know the true value of this product goes beyond even your initial assessment.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the immense potential this product holds for your business.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value in your proposal, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my set limit. I am willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
